Department: Yong Siew Toh Conservatory Of Music
ModuleDescription: This module offers students knowledge about music production with logic pro, acoustics design and microphone techniques for the performing space, and history and theory for pop music.
Prerequisite: MUA1170 Basic Recording 1, MUA1171 Basic Recording 2, MUA2170 Multitrack Recording 1, MUA2170 Multitrack Recording 2
